info.title: Sales Management API
info.description: API documentation for Sales Management System. Use this API to interact with the sales system endpoints.

post.description: Register a new user account and receive an authentication token
Authenticate user with username and password, receive an authentication token

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's information
Get a paginated list of clients
Retrieve details of a specific client by ID
Get a list of clients for search/autocomplete
Get a paginated list of products with optional filtering, searching, and sorting

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, SKU, scientific name, or description

parameters.name: low_stock_only
parameters.description: Show only products with stock at or below alert level

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort field (name, sku, stock_quantity, created_at, updated_at)

post.description: Create a new product in the system

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific product by ID

put.description: Update an existing product. SKU cannot be changed after creation.

422.description: Validation error or SKU change attempt

delete.description: Delete a product. Cannot delete if product has associated purchases or sales.

409.description: Cannot delete product with associated records

message.example: Cannot delete product. It is associated with existing purchases or sales records.

get.description: Get a lightweight list of products for autocomplete/search dropdowns

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term (name, SKU, or scientific name)

parameters.name: show_all_for_empty_search
parameters.description: Show all products if search is empty

post.description: Fetch multiple products by their IDs. Useful for populating form selects/displays.

get.summary: Get available batches for a product
get.description: Get all available batches (with remaining quantity > 0) for a specific product, ordered by expiry date (FIFO)
Generate and download a PDF report of products with optional filters
Generate and download an Excel file of products with optional filters

post.description: Upload an Excel file to get column headers for mapping. First step in the import process.
